JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Forklift drivers for SGL in Herning
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Jobnr. 170878

The Job

For SGL in Herning, we are looking for energetic and dedicated employees for an active, temporary job in the warehouse. Your primary work tasks will be picking and packing, sorting goods, forklift driving, and other service tasks including cleaning, trimming shelf and other ad hoc work. You will get to work in smaller teams, and you can look forward to a good social work environment and a humorous tone. You can also look forward to active working days with a lot of different - and not least - exciting work tasks.

Your profile

You’ll become part of a fast-paced work environment, so we expect you to thrive with active tasks and work at a high pace. You are a stable and dutiful employee who possesses a good sense of order and a great drive. It is not a necessity that you have experience from previous work, as long as you have the will and desire to learn. Furthermore, you:

  • Can communicate – both orally and written – in Danish and/or English
  • Can present a criminal record
  • Look forward to becoming part of a social workplace
  • Forklift certificate required for this job.

Lastly, it is an advantage if you have either a car or bicycle available to get to and from work.

Working hours and wages

Day shift: Monday-Tuesday in the period 07:00-15:00 (Friday- 07:00-14:30).

Evening team: Monday-Thursday in the period 14:00-00:00.

There will be start-up runs, and you can expect a temporary position for 4-5 months.

Salary: By qualifications.

Does this sound interesting?

Click on 'Søg jobbet' to write your application. If you do not already have a profile at Moment, you will be asked to create one as the first step in the application process.

We are looking forward to hearing from you!
